for Degussa P25 and 3CuO/TiO 2 catalysts.A mean value for E a of ca.26 and 12 kJ/mol was calculated for Degussa P25 and 3CuO/TiO 2 , respectively.These positive values of E a imply that the desorption of products is the rate limiting step in the photosynthetic formation of methanol.In addition, the apparent lower activation energy of 3CuO/TiO 2 catalyst may indicate a catalytic role of copper species as an active site to provide methanol, and hence improving the photoefficiency of TiO 2 photocatalyst.The
